comment: I did this class online, and it was super easy. Any time I had a question, the professor would get back to me in a timely manner. All of the instructions in the class were very clear, which is tremendously helpful when you are an online student.

TAKE HIM!! EASY A. All quizzes can be found on Quizlet and he pushes the due date to the end of the semester. Easy discussion post every week. He answers emails fast. there is a book but you don't have to read it to pass.10/10 recommend. Takes late grades.

Extremely responsive and gives great lectures to accompany the book. Participation is key. It's a lot of work, but you're assured a good grade if you just participate in all the weekly assignments. By doing that, you'll also learn a lot about the material, so it's an easy class, and you'll actually learn, so win-win.

Very easy class as there is NO browser lockdown.  No tests, but MANY discussion posts and quizzes. He also has this essay format assignment called a RITN that requires some effort but once again very manageable. You turn in your stuff on time and with accuracy and its extremely easy to get an A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Online Savvy

comment: Prof Belanger is easily one of my favorite professors at ksu. It's such an easy A if you stay on top of your work in class. He's very understanding and answers to emails fast. Definitely recommend him.
this dude loves his word count requirements. made many of the discussion post seem more like fluff than actualy well thought out discussion

This class is ridiculously easy and takes at worst has 2 hours of work a week. If you do all of your assignments early you can easily be done with this course in 9 or 10 weeks. 
As for the professor himself, super quick to respond to emails and seems nice. Definitely take this class for your cultural perspectives class for a SUPER easy A.
This class was perfect, he had a clear grading schedule, his lectures were engaging, and he gave ample time to take quizzes. Definitely take him!

If you do not make an A in this class it is because you did not want to. He gives you so many opportunities to get points that it is practically impossible to fail and if you stay on it and do a lot of assignments early you do not have to do anything the last few weeks! He responds quickly to emails if you have any questions!

Amazing professor. You will not be disappointed taking his class. It is overall pretty easy but you learn a great deal, and it is valuable knowledge. He gives plenty of homework for a grade so you will be sure to get a good grade in this class. I love how clear he is with assignment instructions. Guaranteed A
Easy class, just a lot of busy work that is mainly completion. Gets back to emails fairly quickly and is very knowledgeable and caring. I learned a lot!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lots of homework

comment: Very laid back and will work with you to pass. He also gives more than enough work required to get an A. I was slacking and I still hit well over 895 points by the third month. It's best to do the work before the deadlines so your ideas don't get snatched.

Very hard to not get an A in his class. He gives plenty of opportunities for credit and the way his class is set up, is once you reach a certain amount of points you don't need to do anymore work. He is there to help, but you have to reach out to him in order to receive it. His class is discussion post heavy but it makes you think.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Online Savvy

comment: Overall great professor, do the work and you'll get a good grade. Great man!
This class was a great class! Very easy lots of work, just stay on top of your work and you will get an easy A!!

He informed us it was his 2nd time teaching online, but I could tell. Changed the syllabus a lot due to confusion/over-workload (but never changed due dates from the last term). Quizzes are straight from the textbook, opinionated discussions, and kinda at your own pace. Content drove decency for the class. If you have to take him, you will survive.
This class is super easy. There is a lot of work but it is not difficult at all. He responds to emails pretty quick so if youre confused about anything make sure you email him
This class was super easy. Its a lot of busy work, but its pretty much completion grades. Definitely recommend. Professor is easily accessible.
